com.cscguru.client.entities

Class Mob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Shape
      • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle
        • com.cscguru.client.entities.Entity
          • com.cscguru.client.entities.Agent
            • com.cscguru.client.entities.Mob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClickable, IUpdatable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Mob
extends Agent
implements IClickable
    Base mob class. Handles movement, behavior, drawing, and storing of mob information.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
